scripts.generate:icons: turbo run generate:icons --filter=@squares/ui && pnpm run format
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
